p: Our spatial epidemic model explicitly considers the spatial movement of individuals, and therefore, belongs to the class of individual-based models. Instead of conducting a realistic simulation with the individual-based model as in many previous studies, we have explored a universal property with regard to the final epidemic size by assuming the simple hopping rule from site to site. In this study, the key index Ï• has been introduced based on the numerical observations. One of the future issues is to derive a similar index based on analytical calculations and compare the index with those for other models.
